long_description: Designed for smaller faces, the Julbo Whoops photochromic sunglasses can be worn in a wide variety of light conditions. Zebra(R) NXT photochromic lenses respond quickly to changing light; they darken in bright light and lighten in dim light. NXT polymer lens material provides exceptional optical clarity and visual comfort. Extremely flexible and impact-resistant, NXT lenses are guaranteed not to scratch, break or crack. NXT lenses feature a long-lasting antifog coating that stops condensation from forming on lens surface. Nylon frame wraps close around the face for excellent peripheral protection. Julbo Whoops Photochromic sunglasses include a protective case.
short_description: Designed for smaller faces, the Julbo Whoops photochromic sunglasses can be worn in a wide variety of light conditions.
